# markedTextStyle

**Instance Property**

A dictionary of attributes that describes how to draw marked text.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var markedTextStyle: [NSAttributedString.Key : Any]? { get set }
```

## Discussion

Marked text requires a unique visual treatment when displayed to users. See [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/style-dictionary-keys] for descriptions of the valid keys and values for this dictionary.

## Working with marked and selected text

- **selectedTextRange**: The range of selected text in a document.
- **markedTextRange**: The range of currently marked text in a document.
- **setMarkedText(_:selectedRange:)**: Inserts the provided text and marks it to indicate that it is part of an active input session.
- **setAttributedMarkedText(_:selectedRange:)**: Inserts the provided styled text and marks it to indicate that it is part of an active input session.
- **unmarkText()**: Unmarks the currently marked text.
- **selectionAffinity**: The desired location for the insertion point.
